title: CID arrests civil activist Shehan Malaka
content: Civil society activists Shahan Malaka Gamage has been arrested by the Criminal Investigations Department (CID), over a controversial statement made by him regarding the Easter Sunday attacks.The Police Spokesmanâ€™s Office said that he was arrested by the CID in the Panadura area.Mr. Gamage has been arrested over certain views expressed by him during a media briefing regarding the Easter Sunday terror attacks that took place on 21 April 2019.
